trans-unit.source: Though Dharma Sangha is extremely busy with his meditation approaching its final phase, Dharma Sangha is truly happy to bless everyone and has requested that we group together as much as possible to receive blessings in the most efficient manner.
trans-unit.target: Aunque Dharma Sangha se escuentra extremdamente ocupado con su meditaci칩n llegando a su fase final, Dharma Sangha es verdaderamene feliz de dendecir a todos y ha solicitado que juntemos a la mayor cantidad de gente posible para recibir las bendiciones de la manera m치s efectiva.

trans-unit.source: You can send your photos, names and messages to
trans-unit.target: Pueden enviar sus fotos, nombres y mensajes a

trans-unit.source: with subject "For blessing", Dharma Sangha will see all received requests and bless them.
trans-unit.target: con asunto "Para Bendiciones" Dharma Sangha ver치 todas las solicitudes recibidas y las bendecir치.
